      • rgbToGrayScale

        public static org.opencv.core.Mat rgbToGrayScale​(org.opencv.core.Mat rgb)
        Creates a GrayScale Mat object out of a RGB Mat object using OpenCV
        Parameters:
        rgb - A Mat object that contains the image to process
        Returns:
        a new Mat object with the CV_8UC1 type

      • equalizeGrayMat

        public static org.opencv.core.Mat equalizeGrayMat​(org.opencv.core.Mat gray)
        Creates an equalized Mat object out of a GrayScale Mat object
        Parameters:
        gray - Mat objet to equalize, has to be CV_8UC1
        Returns:
        equalized image in a Mat object

      • medianFilter

        public static org.opencv.core.Mat medianFilter​(org.opencv.core.Mat src,
                                               int kernelSize)
        Computes a blurred image from a source image using the median filter
        Parameters:
        src - a source image contained in a Mat object
        kernelSize - the size of the side of the kernel used for the operation
        Returns:
        a blurred image in a Mat object

        public static org.opencv.core.Mat meanFilter​(org.opencv.core.Mat src,

        Computes a blurred image from a source image using the mean filter
        Parameters:
        src - a source image contained in a Mat object
        kernelSize - the size of the side of the kernel used for the operation
        Returns:
        a blurred image in a Mat object

      • resizeSpecifiedWidth

        public static org.opencv.core.Mat resizeSpecifiedWidth​(org.opencv.core.Mat mat,
                                                       int wantedWidth)
        Resizes a Mat object to a specified width and preserves the original ratio
        Parameters:
        mat - the Mat object to resize
        wantedWidth - int, the wanted width
        Returns:
        a new Mat object of the specified width with the same ratio as the original image
